content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences, taste buds, or the ability to visit physical markets. I exist solely to provide information and assist with questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'm thrilled to hear about your enthusiasm for Korean cuisine! Bibimbap and Japchae are both delicious and popular dishes. Making them at home can be a fun and rewarding experience, and I'm happy to help you with any recipe questions or variations you'd like to try.

If you have any questions about Japchae noodles or gochugaru, I'd be happy to provide information on how to use them, their flavor profiles, and potential substitutes. Just let me know how I can assist you!
